message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $80. Let's start with an offer of $120. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I think a fair price would be around $95 considering my budget and the current market value. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your consideration. In light of this, I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $100. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my research and understanding of the market, I believe $90 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach a satisfactory agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I've given it some thought and I'm willing to consider $95 as a counteroffer. I believe this price respects the value of the product while being mindful of your budget constraints. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can finalize the transaction.
